query:
ALTER TABLE cronogramas 
ADD COLUMN tipoSistema ENUM('PRICE', 'SAC', 'BULLET', 'JUROS_MENSAL', 'LINEAR') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'LINEAR' AFTER observacoes,
ADD COLUMN versaoCalculo INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 AFTER tipoSistema,
ADD COLUMN updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AFTER createdAt
